content: **join our joyful kitties mkal with this free heart coaster ** **our 2024 joyful kitties mkal includes a quilt style afghan and matching pillow** featuring 10 darling kitties **knit in garter stitch with simple intarsia the heart coaster in this intro download** is a great way to become familiar with my fun technique the intro also includes information about yarn amounts and colors needed for the mkal afghan and pillow individual kitty squares are knit using worsted weight yarn in 2 different background colors **with my technique of garter stitch intarsia all the row are knit ** instead of purling the color changes on the back which can be slow and not as neat every ws row is a repeat of the rs row so you can work the ws more easily **best of all garter stitch fabric is lovely and squishy and doesn t need to be blocked ** **our kitty adventure has begun joyful kitties mkal pillow 1 ** be sure to post a photo of your heart coaster to receive your free coupon for this pillow **then we start the first of our afghan kitty squares on february 2 2024 ** a new square will be revealed every third friday through july 19 2024 **by the end of our mkal you will have your very own joyful kitties afghan and matching pillow ** **be sure to post a photo of your finished heart coaster** to your **ravelry project page** or to our **group topic** to receive your **free coupon code for the kitty pillow ** * coupon sent to your ravelry inbox when pillow is available * suitable for advanced beginners i provide support for your questions and help through our ravelry group both line-by-line instructions and chart are included for each square > **join in our craft designs for you ravelry group ** > www ravelry com/groups/craft-designs-for-you > to get future kal patterns for free > and let s knit-along together 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/joyful-kitties-pillow
